songs.title: Big Night
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Kendall]
Oh Oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night

[Verse 1: Carlos]
1, 2, 3 all my boys and girls
We gonna party like it's the end of the world
Let's get it started (Hey!)
Started (Hey!)
Started (Hey!)
Whoa Oh
Waiting all week and it's Friday night
We gonna get dressed up
For the time of our lives
Let's get it started (Hey!)
Started (Hey!)
Started (Hey!)

[Pre-Chorus: Logan]
'Cause I've been feeling down, down, down
I need a pick me up round, round, round
I wanna spin it up loud, loud, loud
DJ take me away

[Chorus: Kendall]
Oh Oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night
Oh oh oh oh oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night

[Verse 2: James]
It's been a long week (yeah)
Been working overtime (let's go)
I need a hot beat (to get)
To get this party right (hoo)
I'm on another level (huh)
Turn up the bass and treble (say what)
Turn it up, turn it up, turn it up

[Pre-Chorus: Logan]
'Cause I've been feeling down, down, down
I need a pick me up round, round, round
I wanna spin it up loud, loud, loud
DJ take me away

[Chorus: Kendall]
Oh Oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night
Oh oh oh oh oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night

[Bridge: All]
1, 2, 3 call your boys and girls
We gonna party like it's the end of the world
Let's get it started
Started (yeah)
Started
Started
Started
Let's go!
1, 2, 3 all my boys and girls (haaa, haaa) (yeah)
We gonna party like it's the end of the world (haa, haaa)
Let's get it started (who's ready, who's ready, who's ready)
Started (yeah)
Started
It's gonna be a big night

[Chorus: Kendall]
Oh Oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night
Oh oh oh oh oh (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big night (eh) (oh, oh oh oh)
We're gonna have a good time (oh, oh oh oh)
It's gonna be a big, big, big, big, big, big night
Big night
